item.title: Liftoff Static Site With GitHub Actions
item.description: Create site 1. Install hugo Hugo is static site generators, this mean is capable to generate HTMl documents from e.g. markdown files supported file types Download Ubuntu package from: https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases $ sudo dpkg -i hugo_0.87.0_Linux-64bit.deb More installing options: https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/ 2 Generate new Hugo site This will be the source repository $ hugo new site <GITHUB-USERNAME>.github.io.source Setup git user if not already
